definition: Wolf Totem, novel by Lü Jiamin aka Jiang Rong
wolf/CL:匹[pi3],隻|只[zhi1],條|条[tiao2]
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
to soar/to gallop/to prance/to turn over/to vacate/to clear

sentences.english: An interesting book I have read is "Totem of wolves ".
sentences.chinese: 我曾经读过的一本很有意思的书，名叫《狼图腾》。

sentences.english: No "Wolf totem" how can we believe that the reality of the book?
sentences.chinese: 没有《狼图腾》这本书我们又怎能相信这一现实呢？

sentences.english: Soon to be added to that list is the translation of a long fiction called "Wolf Totem".
sentences.chinese: 不久长篇小说《狼图腾》也加入了这个行列。

sentences.english: Therefore, Wolf Totem is a successful translation. The thesis consists of six chapters.
sentences.chinese: 由此，可以认为《狼图腾》英译本是成功的译作。

sentences.english: Yu says Wolf Totem, which has just wrapped production, is a perfect example.
sentences.chinese: 于冬认为近期杀青的《狼图腾》就是一个完美的例子。
